CustomField.formula: TRIM(IF(SCC_Tipe_Unit_Kerja__c == 'KW' && (CONTAINS(UPPER(SCC_Orgeh_Description__c),'BRILINK') || CONTAINS(UPPER(SCC_Orgeh_Description__c),'MICRO ECOSYSTEMS')), 'RO - Brilink'+ ' ' + TRIM(RIGHT(Branch_Unit__c,LEN(Branch_Unit__c)-(FIND('KANWIL',Branch_Unit__c)+6))), IF(SCC_Tipe_Unit_Kerja__c == 'KW' && (CONTAINS(UPPER(SCC_Orgeh_Description__c),'OPERATION') || CONTAINS(UPPER(SCC_Orgeh_Description__c),'NETWORK') || CONTAINS(UPPER(SCC_Orgeh_Description__c),'SERVICE')), 'RO - ONS' + ' ' + TRIM(RIGHT(Branch_Unit__c,LEN(Branch_Unit__c)-(FIND('KANWIL',Branch_Unit__c)+6))), IF(SCC_Tipe_Unit_Kerja__c == 'KW' && CONTAINS(UPPER(SCC_Orgeh_Description__c),'MERCHANT'), 'RO - RPM' + ' ' + TRIM(RIGHT(Branch_Unit__c,LEN(Branch_Unit__c)-(FIND('KANWIL',Branch_Unit__c)+6))), IF(SCC_Tipe_Unit_Kerja__c == 'KW' && (CONTAINS(UPPER(SCC_Orgeh_Description__c),'INFORMATION') || CONTAINS(UPPER(SCC_Orgeh_Description__c),'TECHNOLOGY')), 'RO - ITE' + ' ' + TRIM(RIGHT(Branch_Unit__c,LEN(Branch_Unit__c)-(FIND('KANWIL',Branch_Unit__c)+6))), '')))))
CustomField.label: Queue RO
